alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Haskell; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 8:25PM CST until February 26 at 8:45PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR HASKELL...JONES AND SOUTHEASTERN FISHER COUNTIES... At 824 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Millers Creek Reservoir to near Stamford to near Trent, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Lake Stamford Marina and Paint Creek around 830 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Funston, The Intersection Of Us-180 And Ranch Road 126, Us- 277 Near The Haskell- Knox County Line, Tuxedo, Stith, Truby and Hodges. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
